inclusion.criterion: Positive anti-HCV and HCV RNA for more than 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alanine aminotransferase level more than twice the upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has HCV cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB due to NSAID gastritis. He is being treated with lactulose for presumptive hepatic encephalopathy.
